sources.description: Structured research source with reliability and importance qualification. Each source must explain why it is reliable and why it matters for the startup thesis.

reliability.description: 1-5 scale or tier: primary/academic, industry-report, news, blog, social

reliability_reason.description: Why this source is trustworthy (methodology, author, recency)

importance_reason.description: Why this source matters for the startup timing thesis

ideas.description: Startup idea with a strong why-now thesis backed by qualified sources.

why_now_thesis.description: Compelling argument for why this is the right moment

supporting_sources.description: IDs or refs to sources that back the thesis

industry.description: Industry or vertical the idea targets (e.g. healthcare, fintech, edtech)
